Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Hai Bar & Grill Hai Tide Restaurant Hai Tide Pool Bali Experience Hai Tide Beach Resort 2 Nights • Transfers • Breakfast daily Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Hai Tide Beach Resort Package Staying at Hai Tide Beach Resort adds a dimension to your holiday that you won’t forget. The Hai Tide Resort offers adventurous travellers an opportunity to relax and immerse themselves in the natural beauty and serenity of Nusa Lembongan. If you’re just planning to relax on the beach, or want to snorkel and scuba dive around Lembongan Island and beyond, staying on Lembongan allows you more time to enjoy. The unique design of the thatched roofed lumbungs is inspired by a traditional Indonesia rice house. All lumbungs are fitted with ceiling fans, air-conditioning units, en suites and large glass doors which open out onto an intimate verandah perched two metres above a relaxing day bed. Absolute beach front lumbungs enhance the experience as you look out over the ocean and Lembongan Bay. View more View less 2 nights + transfers, breakfast & more from $ 399 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 4pm on 30 Apr 26 or until sold out Deal Includes: Return vehicle transfers from Bali hotels to Benoa Harbour Return boat transfers from Benoa to Nusa Lembongan Island 2 nights accommodation in a Lumbung with full breakfast BBQ lunch on day of arrival Access to Bali Hai Cruises’ Beach Club Unlimited banana boat rides, snorkelling equipment and instruction, Lembongan Island tour, full use of the pontoon facilities including 35m water slide and underwater viewing chamber, diving board, use of the Beach Club facilities including swimming pool and volleyball court FREE use of kayaks and mountain bikes Wi-Fi Flights are additional Itinerary Day 1: Pick up from your hotel to Benoa Harbour and take the Bali Hai II Vessel across to the Bali Hai Pontoon. At the Pontoon you will transfer over to a smaller boat to transfer through to the Island. Upon arrival, check into your lumbungs for the night. BBQ lunch will be served and the afternoon is at leisure. Day 2: Day at leisure. Day 3: Enjoy more free time before you transfer back to the mainland and on to your hotel. Room Types Garden Lumbung Located in a secluded garden of tropical flowers and palm trees, these rooms are perfect for guests who value peace and quiet. 2 night accommodation package from $409 per person share twin. Flights are additional Extra nights from $133 per person Travel 19 Oct 25 - 18 Mar 26, 20 Mar - 17 Apr 26, 21 Apr - 01 May 26, 14 May - 17 May 26, 26 May - 14 Jun 26, 18 Jun - 23 Jun 26, 01 Jul - 07 Jul 26, 12 Jul - 27 Jul 26, 01 Aug - 07 Aug 26, 11 Aug - 31 Aug 26 Beachfront Lumbung Perfect for couples, Balinese Beachfront Lumbungs are located right on the golden sands of Mushroom Bay. This means that you can fall asleep listening to the ocean waves, watch the sunset from your private balcony, or wake up and walk outside for an early morning swim. 2 night accommodation package from $455 per person share twin. Flights are additional Extra nights from $159 per person Travel 23 Oct - 06 Nov 25, 15 Nov 25 - 06 Mar 26, 13 Mar - 18 Mar 26, 20 Mar - 31 Mar 26 2 night accommodation package from $475 per person share twin. Flights are additional Extra nights from $164 per person Travel 01 Apr - 17 Apr 26, 21 Apr - 01 May 26, 14 May - 17 May 26, 26 May - 14 Jun 26, 18 Jun - 23 Jun 26, 01 Jul - 07 Jul 26, 12 Jul - 27 Jul 26, 01 Aug - 07 Aug 26, 11 Aug - 31 Aug 26 Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings only. Valid for travel as specified and sales to 30 Apr 26. International airfares are additional. Prices are per person for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit card fees will apply. Advertised prices are correct as 13 Oct 25 but may vary due to exchange fluctuations or for unforeseen circumstances until paid in full. All prices and products are subject to availability at time of reservation, some surcharges and closeout periods may apply. All travel must be commenced and completed as per dates specified. Return transfers are included from select areas in Bali, please reconfirm with your travel agent. Ferry timings do not allow for same day connection to the Air New Zealand flight departing Denpasar to Auckland, at least one night is required back on the mainland before departing Bali. Packages are based on consecutive night stays – should your needs differ please refer to your House of Travel consultant. Amendment and cancellation fees apply.
